questions.question: Considering the overall shape and dimensions, what best describes the product's form factor?

What color is employed for the product name and description text?
What kind of graphic element, seemingly representing a farm or brand, is shown?
What is the overall texture of the product's packaging material?

Does the design feature any noticeable patterns or repeated motifs aside from the logo?

Is there any other language or symbols used apart from English text and the barcode?

What is the general condition of the product's packaging based on the image?
